price: Ewe Maryamu! Mnyenyekee Mola Mlezi wako na usujudu na uiname pamoja na wainamao.
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
footnotes: Na kwa haya ewe Maryamu, yanakuwajibikia wewe umshukuru Mola wako Mlezi. Basi jilazimishe ut'iifu kwake, na uwe mwenye kushika Swala, na shirikiana na wengine wanao muabudu Mwenyezi Mungu na wanaswali kwa ajili yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
